title: CryptoSyno
author: CryptoSyno
created_time: May 22, 2022, 01:03:16 AMLast edit: June 01, 2022, 11:20:14 AM by CryptoSyno
content: Website: www.cryptosyno.ioDiscord: https://discord.com/invite/cryptosynoTelegram: https://t.me/CryptoSynoTwitter: https://twitter.com/CryptoSyno_CSYNWHY WAS CRYPTOSYNO CREATED?!?CryptoSyno was created out of frustration with poor odds and the lack of transparency from real-world cash casinos. CryptoSyno aims to offer a fair and transparent gaming experience, whether it's meme-coins or utility-based projects you're after.TOKENOMICSBuy1% Sent to burn addressSell1% Reflections2% Sent to burn address2% Sent to slot machine reward poolSLOT MACHINE ODDSHouse odds 0.1% - 10% of the prize pool is sent to the dead address.Big win odds 0.1% - Win 10% of the prize pool.Standard win odds 8% - Win 1% of the prize pool.After three losses in a row, the user is granted a 2x odds increase. Users will keep getting extra odds bonuses for every loss if their losing streak is 3+. After winning any reward, probabilities will reset to normal.VIP STATUS- x1,000 $CSYN token sent to the dead address.- Grants personalized remote concierge service.- Exclusive access to upcoming games.- Exclusive access to upcoming tokens.ROAD MAPMay 4th, 2022New York City Meetup in lower ManhattanMay 29th, 2022Google business profile pageSecurity Audit KYCUnicrypt Presell 8 PM UTCAMA hosted on Discord at 8 PM UTCMay 30th, 2022- Public release of CryptoSyno 6 PM UTC- Fully functional slot machine- Southern California Meetup in Eastvale- AMA hosted on Discord at 8 PM UTCJune 2022- Listed on various indexes, i.e., CMC- Burn event- Â Southern California Meetup in Chino Hills- AMA hosted on Discord at 8 PM UTCJuly 2022- Pursue various exchanges, i.e, Crypto.com- Southern California Meetup in Pasadena- AMA hosted on Discord at 8 PM UTCContinuous- Continue to improve branding, website, dapp- Continue to pursue various exchanges, i.e, Crypto.com- Continue to burn tokens from the total supply

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: First of all move this topic to proper board - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=159.0Quote from: CryptoSyno on May 22, 2022, 01:03:16 AMCryptoSyno was created out of frustration with poor odds and the lack of transparency from real-world cash casinos. CryptoSyno aims to offer a fair and transparent gaming experience, whether it's meme-coins or utility-based projects you're after.There are a lot of legic crypto casinos with "provably fair" mechanism which provide enough transparency. Ods depends on expected reward minus house edge. With good casisnos house edge waries from 1-5% depending on the game.

comments.author: CryptoSyno
comments.body: thank you! I just made three updates:- real-time tracking of available tokens in the pool- tracking of win & loss without page refresh- Improved UIThe next game is a PVP poker table where you can wager any defi token, not just the $CSYN. (House edge sells the token and purchases $CSYN, and sends to dead address)Everything will be open source.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoSyno on June 01, 2022, 11:36:04 AMthank you! I just made three updates:- real-time tracking of available tokens in the pool- tracking of win & loss without page refresh- Improved UIThe next game is a PVP poker table where you can wager any defi token, not just the $CSYN. (House edge sells the token and purchases $CSYN, and sends to dead address)Everything will be open source.Are you reading your own thread, Tytanowy Janusz just suggested that you moved your thread to the announcement thread because this is not the right section for your topic, so far your announcement looks cheap and unprofessional, you never take the time to check the forum rules and sections where to post and what kind of announcement that attracts attention and support.Stop and do your assignment your lack of knowledge on how to effectively promote in this forum overshadows how good your offer is.
